pr_title: PLANNER-2186 Exclude dependencies from revapi check

timeline.bodyText:
Up until now, we have been checking also dependencies of OptaPlanner by revapi. This is necessary if our API exposes types from our dependencies, which I am not aware of.
We might possibly depend on e.g. kie-api in our APIs, but any kiegroup project has it's own revapi check configured via the kie-parent.
timeline.author: rsynek
